this_title: Winston Churchill: A Giant In The Century
trans_title: 温斯顿·丘吉尔：世纪巨人
introduction: Beyond the famous speeches and wealth of media material on the statesman, we span the century as seen from behind the scenes of an exceptional itinerary in order to capture the true dimension of one of the greatest European political figures. Like a thrilling biopic, by turn moving, funny and epic, our documentary is up to its hero.Carefully remastered and colorized, the film ...
chinese_title: 温斯顿·丘吉尔：世纪巨人
foreign_title: Winston Churchill: A Giant In The Century
